article.title: Harris Awarded Order for Falcon III High-Capacity Data Radios by Estonian Ministry of Defense
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation has been awarded two orders for tactical radio equipment totaling over $5 million from the Estonian Ministry of Defense (MOD). The orders include the new Falcon III RF-7800M-MP multiband high-capacity data radio as well as other Harris high-performance tactical communications systems.
